item.text: The Lord spoke to Jeremiah concerning all the Judeans who were living in the land of Egypt, those in Migdol, Tahpanhes, Memphis, and in the region of southern Egypt:
“The Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says, ‘You have seen all the disaster I brought on Jerusalem and all the towns of Judah. Indeed, they now lie in ruins and are deserted.

This happened <st data-num="06440" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="07451 0834">wickedness</st> the people living there <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st>.<n id="1" /> They <st data-num="03707" class="">made</st> me <st data-num="03707" class="">angry</st><n id="2" /> by <st data-num="01980 05647">worshiping</st> and <st data-num="06999" class="">offering sacrifices</st> to<n id="3" /> <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st><n id="4" /> previously <st data-num="03045" class="">knew</st>.<n id="5" />

I <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> my <st data-num="03605 05650">servants</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you people <st data-num="07925 07971">over and over again</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">warning</st> you <st data-num="0408 04994">not</st> to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="08441" class="">disgusting</st> <st data-num="01697 0834">thing</st> I <st data-num="08130" class="">hate</st>.<n id="2" />

But the people of Jerusalem and Judah<n id="1" /> would <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="05186" class="">pay</st> any <st data-num="0241" class="">attention</st>. They would not <st data-num="07725" class="">stop</st> the <st data-num="07451" class="">wickedness</st> they were doing nor <st data-num="01115" class="">quit</st> <st data-num="06999" class="">sacrificing</st> to <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>.<n id="2" />
So my anger and my wrath were poured out and burned like a fire through the towns of Judah and the streets of Jerusalem. That is why they have become the desolate ruins that they are today.’

“So now the Lord God of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, asks, ‘Why will you do such great harm to yourselves? Why should every man, woman, child, and baby of yours be destroyed from the midst of Judah? Why should you leave yourselves without a remnant?

That is what will result from your <st data-num="03707" class="">making</st> me <st data-num="03707" class="">angry</st> by <st data-num="04639" class="">what</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">you</st> <st data-num="04639" class="">are doing</st>.<n id="1" /> You are making me angry by <st data-num="06999" class="">sacrificing</st> to <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> here in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="0935 01481">live</st>. You will be <st data-num="03772" class="">destroyed</st> <st data-num="04616" class="">for doing that</st>! You will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> an <st data-num="07045" class="">example used in curses</st><n id="2" /> and an <st data-num="02781" class="">object of ridicule</st> among <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>.<n id="3" />

Have you <st data-num="07911" class="">forgotten</st> all the <st data-num="07451" class="">wicked things</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> have been <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">towns</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and in the <st data-num="02351" class="">streets</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> by your <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st>, by the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and their<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st>, and by you and your <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st>?
To this day your people have shown no contrition! They have not revered me nor followed the laws and statutes I commanded you and your ancestors.’
“Because of this, the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says, ‘I am determined to bring disaster on you, even to the point of destroying all the Judeans here.

I will <st data-num="03947" class="">see to it</st> that <st data-num="03605">all</st> the <st data-num="03063" class="">Judean</st> <st data-num="07611" class="">remnant</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> was <st data-num="07760 06440">determined</st> to <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="01481">live</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> will be <st data-num="08552" class="">destroyed</st>. <st data-num="08033" class="">Here</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> they will <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> in <st data-num="02719" class="">battle</st><n id="2" /> or <st data-num="08552" class="">perish</st> from <st data-num="07458" class="">starvation</st>. <st data-num="06996 05704 01419">People of every class</st><n id="3" /> will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> in <st data-num="02719" class="">war</st> or from <st data-num="07458" class="">starvation</st>. They will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> an object of <st data-num="08047" class="">horror</st> and <st data-num="02781" class="">ridicule</st>, an example of those who have been <st data-num="0423" class="">cursed</st> and that people use in <st data-num="07045" class="">pronouncing a curse</st>.<n id="4" />

I will <st data-num="06485 05921">punish</st> those who <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> with <st data-num="02719" class="">war</st>, <st data-num="07458" class="">starvation</st>, and <st data-num="01698">disease</st>, just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> I <st data-num="06485 05921">punished</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>.

None of the Judean remnant who have come to live in the land of Egypt will escape or survive to return to the land of Judah. Though they long to return and live there, none of them shall return except a few fugitives.’”

Then all the men who were aware that their wives were sacrificing to other gods, as well as all their wives, answered Jeremiah—there was a great crowd of them representing all the people who lived in northern and southern Egypt—
“We will not listen to what you claim the Lord has spoken to us!

<st data-num="03588" class="">Instead</st> we will <st data-num="06213 06213">do</st> <st data-num="03605 01697 0834">everything</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">we</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">vowed</st> we would do.<n id="1" /> We will <st data-num="06999" class="">sacrifice</st> and <st data-num="05258" class="">pour out</st> <st data-num="05262" class="">drink offerings</st> to the goddess called the <st data-num="04446" class="">Queen</st> of <st data-num="08064" class="">Heaven</st><n id="2" /> just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> and our <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st>, our <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st>, and our <st data-num="08269" class="">leaders</st> previously <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and in the <st data-num="02351" class="">streets</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>. For then we <st data-num="07646" class="">had plenty of</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st>, <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">well off</st>, and <st data-num="07200" class="">had</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">troubles</st>.<n id="3" />

But <st data-num="04480" class="">ever</st> <st data-num="0227" class="">since</st> we <st data-num="02308" class="">stopped</st> <st data-num="06999" class="">sacrificing</st> and <st data-num="05258" class="">pouring out</st> <st data-num="05262" class="">drink offerings</st> to the <st data-num="04446" class="">Queen</st> of <st data-num="08064" class="">Heaven</st>, we have <st data-num="02637" class="">been in</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">great</st> <st data-num="02637" class="">need</st>. Our people have <st data-num="08552" class="">died</st> in <st data-num="02719" class="">wars</st> or of <st data-num="07458" class="">starvation</st>.”<n id="1" />

The women added, “We did indeed sacrifice and pour out drink offerings to the Queen of Heaven. But it was with the full knowledge and approval of our husbands that we made cakes in her image and poured out drink offerings to her.”
Then Jeremiah replied to all the people, both men and women, who responded to him in this way:

“The Lord did indeed remember and call to mind what you did! He remembered the incense you and your ancestors, your kings, your leaders, and all the rest of the people of the land offered to other gods in the towns of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem.

Finally the Lord could no longer endure your wicked deeds and the disgusting things you did. That is why your land has become the desolate, uninhabited ruin that it is today. That is why it has become a proverbial example used in curses.

You have sacrificed to other gods. You have sinned against the Lord! You have not obeyed the Lord! You have not followed his laws, his statutes, and his decrees. That is why this disaster that is evident to this day has happened to you.”
Then Jeremiah spoke to all the people, particularly to all the women, “Listen to the Lord’s message, all you people of Judah who are in Egypt.

This is what the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, has said, ‘You women have confirmed by your actions what you vowed with your lips! You said, “We will certainly carry out our vows to sacrifice and pour out drink offerings to the Queen of Heaven.” Well, then fulfill your vows! Carry them out!’

But listen to the Lord’s message, all you people of Judah who are living in the land of Egypt: The Lord says, ‘I hereby swear by my own great name that none of the people of Judah who are living anywhere in Egypt will ever again invoke my name in their oaths! Never again will any of them use it in an oath saying, “As surely as the Sovereign Lord lives.”

I will <st data-num="02005" class="">indeed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08245" class="">see to it</st> that <st data-num="07451" class="">disaster</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">prosperity</st>, happens <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> them.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> will <st data-num="08552" class="">die</st> in <st data-num="02719" class="">war</st> or from <st data-num="07458" class="">starvation</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="03615" class="">not one</st> of them <st data-num="03615" class="">is left</st>.

<st data-num="06412" class="">Some who survive</st> the <st data-num="02719" class="">battle</st> will <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st> to the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>. But <st data-num="04962" class="">they</st> will be <st data-num="04557" class="">very few</st> indeed!<n id="1" /> Then the <st data-num="03063" class="">Judean</st> <st data-num="03605 07611">remnant</st> who have <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="01481 08033">live</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> will <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="04310" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">word</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">proves true</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">mine</st> or <st data-num="01992" class="">theirs</st>.’
Moreover the Lord says, ‘I will make something happen to prove that I will punish you in this place. I will do it so that you will know that my threats to bring disaster on you will prove true.

I, the Lord, promise that I will hand Pharaoh Hophra king of Egypt over to his enemies who are seeking to kill him. I will do that just as surely as I handed King Zedekiah of Judah over to King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon, his enemy who was seeking to kill him.’”
